code:
# @param {String} s
# @param {String} a
# @param {String} b
# @param {Integer} k
# @return {Integer[]}
def beautiful_indices(s, a, b, k)
    beautiful_indices = []
    a_indices = []
    b_indices = []
    s.length.times do |i|
        a_indices << i if s[i, a.length] == a
        b_indices << i if s[i, b.length] == b
    end

    b_start, b_end = 0, 0
    a_indices.each do |i|
        while b_start < b_indices.size && b_indices[b_start] < i - k
            b_start += 1
        end
        while b_end < b_indices.size && b_indices[b_end] <= i + k
            b_end += 1
        end
        beautiful_indices << i if b_start != b_end
    end

    beautiful_indices
end
